title: I'm marked as a AFK/Leaver
body:
Hi
Lately, my computer has given me trouble recently and I have been getting BSOD and this happen only after champion select and I get into game. After that BSOD, the game remakes and I have to be marked as a leaver and I am in low priority queue. I was wondering if there is any riot staff that can maybe clear my name as I'm trying to figure out the problems I've been having. 

Thank You

replies.body: nope. your system is your job. people either have to wait for eternity when you leave que/pick or have to play 4v5 when you leave ingame. if you know your system bugs try it in customs.

You might have a pretty serious hardware or driver failure if you're getting a blue screen once the game tries to load.  It's really important to get this fixed up and prevent anymore [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  Even though the leave isn't your intention, the system will treat all leaves equally because they still cause other players a negative experience. 

 I suggest going over each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot this error, and test it in a custom game.  Let me know if you're still impacted by the issue.
I did manage to fix it, but I was wondering how long the low priority queue lasts.
The amount of requires games depends on the severity of the penalty.  It looks like yours was pretty low and already completed!  Make sure to stay consistent!
